summary: Invite some GWAR into your game.
descriptionHtml:
Balsac the Jaws of Death

Guitarist and mouthpiece for GWAR.

When asked how he comes up with his music he replied that he composes his music by scraping his scrotum on his frets.

Craft under misc.

Adds three pieces of armor
1. Balsac body. A hide armor with goat legs. Think Satyr.
2.Balsac armor. His shoulder spikes and other iconic Balsac pieces that transfer from tour to tour.
3. Balsac jaws. The big ass jaws of death. takes up the circlet slot.

"Have a good night and I hope you kill everyone worth killin. I know I will."
author: MurdermiesteR
